question: What is Heaven Hub
answer: Heaven Hub is a real estate platform that helps users buy, sell, or rent properties effortlessly.

question: How can I search for properties
answer: You can use the search bar on the homepage to filter properties by location, price, or type.

question: What property types do you offer
answer: We offer residential, commercial, and rental properties, including apartments, houses, offices, and more.

question: How do I list my property
answer: Click on the 'List Property' button on the homepage, create an account, and follow the steps to upload details about your property.

question: Is there a fee to list my property
answer: Listing your property is free, but we offer premium plans for better visibility.

question: Can I schedule a visit to a property
answer: Yes, you can schedule a visit by clicking on the 'Schedule Visit' button on the property page.

question: How do I contact the property owner
answer: Property owner details are available on the property page. You can use the provided contact form or call directly.

question: What locations are covered by Heaven Hub
answer: We currently operate in major cities across India, including Delhi, Mumbai, Bengaluru, and Hyderabad.

question: How can I register on Heaven Hub
answer: Click on the 'Sign Up' button on the homepage and provide your email, phone number, and a password to create an account.

question: What should I do if I forget my password
answer: Click on the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page and follow the instructions to reset your password.

question: Does Heaven Hub verify listed properties
answer: Yes, we verify all listed properties to ensure they meet our quality standards and provide accurate information.

question: Are there any hidden charges
answer: No, we believe in transparency and do not have any hidden charges.

question: Can I negotiate the property price
answer: Yes, you can negotiate directly with the property owner or agent using our chat feature or during the visit.

question: How do I report a fraudulent listing
answer: If you suspect a fraudulent listing, please click on 'Report' on the property page or contact our support team.

question: Does Heaven Hub provide loans or financing
answer: We partner with financial institutions to help you with home loans. Visit our 'Loan Assistance' section for more details.

question: Can I rent properties through Heaven Hub
answer: Yes, we have a wide range of rental properties available. Use the 'Rent' filter in the search options.

question: What payment methods are accepted for premium plans
answer: We accept credit cards, debit cards, UPI, and net banking for premium plan subscriptions.

question: How do I update my property listing
answer: Log in to your account, navigate to 'My Listings,' and click 'Edit' to update your property details.

question: What is the minimum lease period for rental properties
answer: The minimum lease period depends on the property. Check the details on the rental property page.

question: Can I save properties I like
answer: Yes, you can save properties by clicking on the 'Save' icon on each property page.

question: How do I unsubscribe from promotional emails
answer: You can unsubscribe by clicking the 'Unsubscribe' link at the bottom of our emails.

question: What amenities are usually listed with properties
answer: Amenities such as parking, gym, swimming pool, and 24/7 security are commonly listed.

question: How do I filter properties by budget
answer: Use the price range slider in the search bar to filter properties based on your budget.

question: Is there a mobile app for Heaven Hub
answer: Yes, our mobile app is available on both Android and iOS platforms. Download it from the respective app stores.

question: Can I add multiple properties to my listing
answer: Yes, you can list multiple properties from your account dashboard.

question: How often is the property data updated
answer: Our property data is updated in real-time to ensure accuracy.

question: Can I delete my property listing
answer: Yes, you can delete your listing from the 'My Listings' section in your account dashboard.

question: How do I book a property
answer: To book a property, click on 'Contact Owner' and finalize the details directly with them.

question: Does Heaven Hub charge commission
answer: We do not charge any commission. Any fees are limited to premium plans for enhanced visibility.

question: Can I post a requirement for a property
answer: Yes, you can post your requirements in the 'Post Requirement' section, and property owners will contact you.

question: What is the refund policy for premium plans
answer: Our refund policy is detailed in the 'Terms & Conditions' section. Please review it for specific cases.

question: Do you provide customer support
answer: Yes, our customer support team is available 24/7 via chat and email.

question: Can I compare multiple properties
answer: Yes, you can use the 'Compare' feature to compare details of up to three properties.

question: What is a verified property
answer: A verified property has been inspected and approved by our team to ensure accuracy and quality.

question: How do I update my profile information
answer: Log in to your account and navigate to 'Profile Settings' to update your information.

question: What happens after I book a property
answer: After booking, you will coordinate with the property owner to finalize the deal and complete any paperwork.

question: Can I share property details with others
answer: Yes, you can share property details via email or social media using the share buttons on the property page.

question: What documents are required for renting
answer: Typically, an ID proof, address proof, and lease agreement are required for renting.

question: How do I know if a property is available
answer: Property availability is displayed on the property page. Contact the owner for real-time updates.

question: Do you offer property management services
answer: Yes, we offer property management services for landlords. Contact our team for details.

question: Can I advertise my real estate business on Heaven Hub
answer: Yes, we offer advertising opportunities. Visit the 'Advertise With Us' section for more information.

question: What are the benefits of a premium plan
answer: Premium plans provide better visibility, top placement in search results, and additional analytics.

question: Can I customize property alerts
answer: Yes, you can set up customized alerts for new properties that match your preferences.

question: What is the difference between buying and renting
answer: Buying gives you ownership, while renting is a temporary arrangement. Both options have their pros and cons.

question: How do I get notified about new listings
answer: Sign up for our email notifications or enable push notifications on the mobile app.

question: What is a virtual property tour
answer: A virtual tour allows you to view the property online using 360-degree images or videos.

question: How secure is my data on Heaven Hub
answer: We follow strict data privacy protocols to ensure the security of your personal information.
